author: pmaksim1
body:
This PR is essentially the same as #17502 , except that diff would say that everything has changed since almost all the code was consistently reformatted.   We also replaced one ;; with a ;.

We also commented out the use of 2D templates in template splitter, since it was not being used anywhere.  (It might one day, but it is not needed now.)

The code has been tested on
- Phase 1 MC
- Run 1 data.  The code is backwards compatible since we get identical results.
(More details at the Pixel Offline meeting at https://indico.cern.ch/event/607516/)

To run on 0T or 3.8T data, the code needs to load the new templates.
title: Pixel template local reconstruction for Phase 1
